channel.title: 508 shops

item.title: 508 shops
item.dc:creator: @HotDogs1 HotDogs1
item.description:
@HotDogs1 wrote:

How do i find the npc number of a shop on a 508
the shopbufconfig just says
else if (p.shopid == 7 && pi.hasPlayerItemAmount(p, 995, p.shop7p[itemSlot]))
{
pi.deleteItem(p, 995, pi.getItemSlot(p, 995), p.shop7p[itemSlot]);
pi.addItem(p, p.shop7[itemSlot], 1);
}
Thanks for the help.

Read full topic
